name: Resident Evil Village - Shadows of Rose
name_original: Resident Evil Village - Shadows of Rose
description:
16 years have passed since that incident...
Ethan's beloved daughter, Rosemary Winters, is living a healthy life.
But struggling to come to terms with her innate special powers,
she decides to dive into the world of the Megamycete's consciousness,
or the "realm of consciousness," to seal them.

What she discovers is an extraordinary world far from the reality of the past.
A collection of memories of "that village" absorbed by the Megamycete.
